column1: * 1955 - The sixth and final episode of The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series) of The Fellowship of the Ring airs on the BBC Third Programme.
* 2002 – The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers premières.
* 2007 - MGM and New Line Cinema announce the The Hobbit (film series).
** The Fellowship of the Ring is formed.Category:Datesfi:18. joulukuuta
